name: KIWI DEPLOYER BOT
description: Kiwi revolutionizes participation in blockchain technology by empowering anyone to create and manage ERC-404 tokens through its easy-to-use Telegram bot. Its approach promotes democratization, inclusion, and innovation. The Kiwi Telegram bot simplifies ERC-404 token creation through an intuitive interface. Users can: - KiwiBot simplifies token creation with an intuitive, no-code platform. Users can easily customize and deploy ERC-404 tokens. - Fast deployment allows launching tokens quickly to engage communities sooner. - IPFS integration enables decentralized storage and distribution of token metadata. The platform is committed to continuous innovation and pushing boundaries in token creation and DeFi. Kiwi prioritizes security and reliability with audited contracts and gas optimization.
